Sql.query: select fljdetcodi, fljfechamsg, a.areaabrev as nombareaorig, b.areaabrev as nombareadest, fljmsg, case fljmsgestado when 'P' then 'Pendiente' when 'A' then 'Activo' else '' end as fljmsgestado, p.paramvalue||fljfileruta as filerutax, fljfileruta from doc_flujo_det_msg f , fw_area a, fw_area b,doc_parameter p where fljdetcodi = :fljdetcodi and a.areacode = areaorig and b.areacode = areadest and f.fljmsgestado!='B' and f.fileserver = p.paramcodi order by fljfechamsg desc

select f.fljcodi, d.fljdetcodi, case when upper(a.areaabrev) = 'NONE' then 'EMP' else a.areaabrev end as areaabrev , d.fljcadatencion as tatdesc, d.fljfechainicio, d.fljfechaatencion, d.fljestado, a.areacode, d.fljpadrecomentario as descripdeleg, case when upper(b.areaabrev) = 'NONE' then 'EMP' else b.areaabrev end as origen, b.areacode as areacodeorig, d.fljfechamax, d.lastuser, d.lastdate, d.areapadre, d.fljpadreleido, d.fljdetnivel, d.fljdetorigen, d.fljdetdestino, d.fljnmsghijo as nmsg, d.fljmaster, d.percodi, d.percodipadre from doc_flujo f, doc_flujo_det d, fw_area a,fw_area b where f.fljcodi = :fljcodi and d.fljcodi = f.fljcodi and d.areacode = a.areacode and d.fljdetnivel >= 0 and d.areapadre = b.areacode and d.fljestado not in ('B') and d.percodi = -1 and d.fljdetdestino != -1 order by d.fljdetcodi asc

select f.fljcodi, d.fljdetcodi, case when upper(a.areaabrev) = 'NONE' then 'EMP' else a.areaabrev end as areaabrev , u.username as destino, d.fljdetprio as prioridad, d.fljcadatencion as tatdesc, d.fljfechainicio, d.fljfechaatencion, d.fljestado, a.areacode, d.fljpadrecomentario as descripdeleg, b.areaabrev as origen, b.areacode as areacodeorig, d.fljfechamax, d.lastuser, d.lastdate, d.areapadre, d.fljpadreleido, d.fljdetnivel, d.fljdetorigen, d.fljdetdestino, d.fljnmsghijo as nmsg, d.fljmaster, d.percodi, d.percodipadre from doc_flujo f, doc_flujo_det d, fw_area a,fw_area b,fw_user u where f.fljcodi = :fljcodi and d.fljcodi = f.fljcodi and d.areacode = a.areacode and d.fljdetnivel >= 0 and d.areapadre = b.areacode and d.percodi = u.usercode and d.fljdetorigen = :fljdetorigen and d.areapadre = :areapadre and d.fljestado not in ('B','X') and d.percodi > 0 and d.fljdetdestino != -1 order by d.fljdetcodi asc

select d.fljcadatencion, d.areapadre, d.areacode, d.fljpadrecomentario as descripdeleg, d.fljfechamax from doc_flujo f, doc_flujo_det d where f.fljcodi = :fljcodi and d.fljcodi = f.fljcodi and d.fljestado not in ('B') and d.fljdetnivel < 98 and d.areapadre is not null order by d.fljdetcodi asc

select f.fljnombre, f.corrnumproc, m.paramvalue || a.fileruta as xfileruta, f.fljnumext, d.fljcodi, d.fljdetcodi as referido, d.tatcodi, d.fljestado, d.fljfechaatencion, f.fljfechaorig from doc_flujo_det d, doc_flujo f,doc_flujo_files a ,doc_parameter m where d.fljdetcodi in (select r.fljdetcodiref from doc_flujo_ref_flujo r where r.fljdetcodi in (select m.fljdetcodi from doc_flujo_det m where m.fljcodi = :fljcodi and m.fljdetnivel in (0,99) )) and f.fljcodi = d.fljcodi and f.fljcodi = a.fljcodi and a.fileatrib = 'F' and a.fileserver = m.paramcodi order by f.fljfechaorig desc

select f.fljnombre, f.corrnumproc, b.paramvalue || a.fileruta as xfileruta, f.fljnumext, d.fljcodi, d.fljdetcodi as referido, d.tatcodi, d.fljestado, d.fljfechaatencion, f.fljfechaorig from doc_flujo_det d, doc_flujo f,doc_flujo_files a,doc_parameter b where d.fljdetcodi in (select r.fljdetcodi from doc_flujo_ref_flujo r where r.fljdetcodiref in (select m.fljdetcodi from doc_flujo_det m where m.fljcodi = :fljcodi and m.fljdetnivel in ( 0,99) )) and f.fljcodi = d.fljcodi and f.fljcodi = a.fljcodi and a.fileatrib = 'F' and a.fileserver = b.paramcodi order by f.fljfechaorig desc

select fljdetcodi, fljfechamsg, areaorig, areadest, fljmsgestado, fljmsg, fljcodimsg, p.paramvalue || fljfileruta as filerutax , a.areaabrev as nombareaorig, b.areaabrev as nombareadest, f.lastuser, f.fljmsgleido, f.fljfileruta from doc_flujo_det_msg f , fw_area a, fw_area b,doc_parameter p where fljdetcodi = :fljdetcodi and a.areacode = areaorig and b.areacode = areadest and f. fljmsgestado != 'B' and f.fileserver = p.paramcodi order by fljfechamsg desc

select x.filecodi, y.paramvalue || x.fileruta as xfileruta, x.fljdetcodi, x.fljcodi, x.filecomentario, x.lastuser, x.fileanio, x.lastdate from doc_flujo_files x,doc_parameter y where x.fljcodi = :fljcodi and x.fljdetcodi = :fljdetcodi and x.fileatrib ='F' and x.fileserver = y.paramcodi
select d.filecodi, d.filecomentario, p.PARAMVALUE || d.fileruta as xfileruta from doc_flujo_files d, doc_parameter p where d.fileserver = p.paramcodi and fljcodi=:fljcodi and fileatrib='C'
select a.areacode,a.areaname from fw_area a where a.areacode = :areacode union select a.areacode,a.areaname from fw_area a where a.areapadre = :areacode order by 2 asc
select compcode,areacode,areaname,areaabrev from fw_area where compcode = 1
select t.docrolcodi from doc_rol_user t where t.usercode = :usercode
select etiqcode, etiqnomb from doc_etiquetas where areacode = :areacode and bandejalvl = :bandejalvl and etiqestado = 'A' order by 2 asc
select etiqcode, etiqnomb, bandejalvl from doc_etiquetas where areacode = :areacode and etiqestado = 'A' order by 2 asc
select tatabrev,tatcodi2 from doc_tipo_atencion where tathabil ='S' order by 1 asc
select count(*) from doc_rol_user where usercode = :usercode and docrolcodi = :docrolcodi
select * from doc_dia_esp
select fileruta from doc_flujo_files where fljcodi = :fljcodi and fileatrib = 'D'
select f.fileruta from doc_flujo_files f where f.filecodi = :filecodi
select t.emprcodi,trim(t.emprnomb) as emprnomb,t.tipoemprcodi from si_empresa t order by 2 asc

select e.emprcodi,trim(e.emprnomb) as emprnomb, e.tipoemprcodi from si_empresa e where e.emprcodi not in ( select x.emprecodi from si_registro_integ x where x.regempactivo = 'S') and e.tipoemprcodi not in (1,2,3,4, 5) order by 2 asc

select e.emprcodi,trim(e.emprnomb) as emprnomb ,e.tipoemprcodi from si_registro_integ t,si_empresa e where t.emprecodi = E.Emprcodi and t.regempfecacep is not null and t.regempfecbaja is null and t.REGEMPELIMINADO = 'N' and ( e.tipoemprcodi= {0} or e.emprcodi = 0) union select f.emprcodi,f.emprnomb, {0} from si_empresa f where f.emprcodi =0 order by 2 asc

select m.*, f.fileruta, extract(month from m.fechaproceso) as mes from doc_migracion m inner join doc_flujo_files f on m.filecodi = f.filecodi where m.anio = {0} and extract(month from m.fecharecepcion) = {1} --and correlativo = '2895'
update doc_migracion set rutafile = '{0}', rutacd = '{1}', rutavol = '{2}', tipovol = '{3}' where fljcodi = {4} and fljdetcodi = {5}
